Articles.Content: clicking on the color manager button after opening it wont close the color manager.

The color manager closes once you switch to another tool. The color manager works like the translate tool, or the select/placement tool. Simply pressing 1, or clicking the corresponding button will close it.

You don't close it by clicking the color tool again. Instead, treat it like the toolbar in Photoshop (or any similar program) and select another tool. That will close it.

Edited February 26, 2023 by Lorunification
